ESRI.Configuration.Name: QueryByED
ESRI.Configuration.Description: Used in conjunction with Data Driven Pages to build and apply specific queries automatically.
ESRI.Configuration.Author: JStephaniuk

Button.caption: Query Points By ED
Button.message: When pressed, specific points for current data driven page will be displayed while points outside current page removed.
Button.Help: If he doesn't work here anymore figure it out yourself.
